content: I hope the Mods will allow this youtube film of the Navy Presidental Drill Team as they performed in Norway where they won 1st Place in the World Drill Team competition. This was three years ago but, like I, maybe some missed it. Thanks Way to go swabbies...... MOD HAT ON The video is perfectly acceptable. The hot link is not and you've been around here long enough to know that, so I deleted it. You may repost it as a cold link, if you wish. This message has been edited. Last edited by: stillkit, Sun 12 April 2009 09:01 PM
